aircraft.value: Minotaur Heavy - AC-6561-821 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Fuel nozzle blockage. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 30/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 02/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 02/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 06/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
